String.string: Take care! May Kaia give you strength.
Speak with Rida at {@Rgn:84001$$Kaiator} Command Center again.
Talk to Commander {@creature:528#5005$$Tamur} at {@Rgn:84001$$Kaiator} Command Center. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1088$$Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Report to {@creature:528#5005$$Tamur} at {@Rgn:84001$$Kaiator} Command Center that you'll join the federation.
Go outside Headquarters to meet Kunar. [Speak with {@creature:528#5008$$Kamat} to go outside Headquarters.]
Hasmina calls you over. Speak with Hasmina.
Hasmina seems to be thinking deeply about something.
You arrived at Kaiator Transporation Hall!
Follow Hasmina to the Kaiator Transporation Hall.
Follow Hasmina to the Kaiator Transporation Hall.
Speak with Hasmina at the Transporation Hall.
Speak with Kunar and receive your supplies.
